data.title: IMODIUM® Zapid®
data.summary:
IMODIUM® Zapid® tablets come in a unique format, that dissolves instantly on
your tongue, without the need for water.

data.title: IMODIUM® Advanced®
data.summary:
IMODIUM® Advanced® tablets provide multi symptom relief of diarrhoea and wind
pain including painful cramps, bloating and gas.
